keyMoments.title: Inazuma Emerges at Marineford
keyMoments.description: Inazuma appears on the battlefield after being hidden in Ivankov's hair, ready to aid in the rescue of Ace.
keyMoments.significance: Marks Inazuma's active participation in the Marineford War and sets up their crucial role in helping Luffy.

keyMoments.title: Inazuma Creates Bridge with Choki Choki no Mi
keyMoments.description: Inazuma uses their Devil Fruit powers to cut and fold the ground of Marineford, creating a bridge directly to the execution platform.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the tactical application of the Choki Choki no Mi and provides the critical path for Luffy to reach Ace.

abilities.description: Allows the user to transform parts of their body into scissors and cut solid objects as if they were paper, including manipulating stone and earth.

relationships.description: Inazuma serves as an officer under Emporio Ivankov in the Revolutionary Army.

evolutionMoments.description: Inazuma emerges from Ivankov's hair to assist in the battle at Marineford.

reveals.information: Can use Choki Choki no Mi to manipulate terrain by cutting and folding solid ground

keyMoments.title: Conqueror's Haki Recognized
keyMoments.description: Various characters including Fossa, Garp, and Ace acknowledge that Luffy possesses Conqueror's Haki, placing him among the elite.
keyMoments.significance: Confirms Luffy's rare ability and potential as a future great pirate, comparing him to Whitebeard and Shanks.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Advances on Inazuma's Bridge
keyMoments.description: Luffy charges toward the execution platform on the bridge created by Inazuma, getting closer to rescuing Ace than ever before.
keyMoments.significance: Represents the climax of Luffy's desperate journey through the battlefield.

keyMoments.title: Confronted by Garp
keyMoments.description: Luffy faces his grandfather Garp who blocks his path to Ace, creating a heart-wrenching family conflict.
keyMoments.significance: Forces Luffy to choose between his goal of saving Ace and his relationship with his grandfather.

relationships.description: Garp is Luffy's grandfather, creating a painful conflict as Garp must block Luffy's path to save Ace.

evolutionMoments.description: Garp intercepts Luffy before he can reach Ace, declaring that Luffy must defeat him to pass.

reveals.information: Vice Admiral Doberman notes that Luffy's Conqueror's Haki is not surprising given he is the son of Revolutionary Dragon

keyMoments.title: Garp Reveals He Suspected Luffy's Haki
keyMoments.description: Garp comments that Luffy was born with Conqueror's Haki, as he had suspected.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Garp's deep understanding of his grandson's potential and hints at his long-standing awareness of Luffy's destiny.
keyMoments.quote: Luffy was born with it, as I had thought.

keyMoments.title: Garp Intercepts Luffy
keyMoments.description: Garp blocks Luffy's path to the execution platform, declaring that Luffy must defeat him to save Ace.
keyMoments.significance: Creates one of the most emotionally devastating moments in the series as Garp is forced to choose between duty and family.
keyMoments.quote: If you want to get past me, then it'll be over my dead body!

keyMoments.title: Garp's Impossible Position
keyMoments.description: Garp's stance on the bridge reveals the tragic conflict between his role as a Marine hero and his love for both his grandsons.
keyMoments.significance: Epitomizes the personal cost of the Marineford War and the sacrifices demanded by duty.

relationships.description: Garp is Luffy's grandfather, forced to block his path in the Marineford War.

evolutionMoments.description: Garp confronts Luffy on the bridge to the execution platform, creating a heartbreaking family conflict.

relationships.description: Garp is Ace's adoptive grandfather, torn between protecting him and his Marine duty.

evolutionMoments.description: Garp stands guard over Ace's execution platform while struggling with his love for his grandson.

name.japanese: エドワード・ニューゲート

keyMoments.title: Whitebeard Orders Support for Luffy
keyMoments.description: Whitebeard commands his entire crew and allied forces to clear a path for Luffy to reach the execution platform.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Whitebeard's tactical brilliance and his recognition of Luffy as worthy of the new generation's hope.

name.japanese: ポートガス・D・エース

keyMoments.title: Ace Recognizes Luffy's Conqueror's Haki
keyMoments.description: Ace acknowledges that his brother also possesses Conqueror's Haki, showing pride and concern.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Ace's awareness of the rare power and his complex emotions about Luffy risking everything to save him.

name.japanese: エンポリオ・イワンコフ

keyMoments.title: Ivankov Explains Luffy's Unconscious Haki
keyMoments.description: Ivankov notes that Luffy is not aware he is using Conqueror's Haki and is therefore not yet ready to control it properly.
keyMoments.significance: Explains Luffy's current limitations and foreshadows his future training and mastery of Haki.

relationships.description: Inazuma serves as an officer under Ivankov in the Revolutionary Army.

evolutionMoments.description: Inazuma emerges from Ivankov's hair to assist in the Marineford battle.
